content: Emmanouil Pountourakis | Drexel CCI Skip to main content Emmanouil PountourakisAssistant ProfessorComputer Science Phone215.895.0503Emailep556@drexel.eduWebsite(s)cs.drexel.edu/~ep556 Emmanouil PountourakisAssistant ProfessorComputer ScienceBiographyEmmanouil Pountourakis, PhD is an assistant professor of computer science at the College of Computing & Informatics (CCI) at Drexel University. Prior to joining Drexel's faculty, Pountourakis was a postdoctoral fellow in the Wireless Network and Communications Group at University of Texas at Austin and a research fellow for the Spring 2018 Real Time Decision Making program at the Simons Institute for the Theory of Computing. He earned his PhD in 2017 in the Theory group at Northwestern University, and is completing a post doc at the University of Texas at Austin.
